headline: CNN Live Event/Special
subHeadline: The White House Correspondents' Dinner. Aired 10-11p ET

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: This is Joe and Jill. After years of long commutes to work, they finally decided to take the leap and move into their dream home.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Unfortunately, it's a bit of a fixer upper to put it nicely.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: But we've got some big ideas to give the White House press area a big refresh.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: This is so exciting. A press room refresh.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: This is fantastic. I cannot wait to hear these ideas. We are really great fans of your work.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: We are pitching replacing all the furniture in the White House workspace new cabinets, new flooring, new lighting everything to give it a new modern positive vibe. (Inaudible) simple and within your budget.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Sounds good. There are a few--

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Other ideas we'd like to get your approval on as well.JEAN-PIERRE: We're only supposed to be doing the press row. UNIDENTIFIED MALE: We've been doing this a long time and we think we know how to turn the White House into the white home. And that's by personalizing it.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: We've commissioned Doug Mills from the New York Times to shoot some Tasteful Nudes of past presidents that we can display along the wall throughout the space.JEAN-PIERRE: I don't think this is going to fly.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: OK. OK. Let's move on to the next idea because you are going to love it. We take the entire West Wing down to the studs, get rid of all those ugly offices and create one massive sleek modern room. Then we build those the Rose Garden, lose the West colonnade and transform the Oval Office into a Dave and Busters. How fun would that be?

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: Your host has ended the meeting.

utterances.speaker: MARTHA STEWART, AMERICAN BUSINESSWOMAN
utterances.sentences: I knew you'd come crawling back. They always do.(END VIDEO CLIP)
